content:
Your task is to create python puzzle chunks. Each chunk should end in print. Please,
        don't provide anything else than the code, no questions, no answers, no hints, nothing.
Give me a python puzzle involving lambda functions. It should have at most 6 lines of code
O, that is what I was looking for, give me another one

(lambda f: (lambda x: x(x))(lambda y: (lambda z: f(lambda v: y(y)(v)))(lambda w: f(lambda v: y(y)(v)))))\
    (lambda f: (lambda n: 1 if n == 0 else n * f(n-1)))\
    (5)
Oh, that one is to hard, please give me something easier
That one is to easy, try to give me something on my level
(lambda f: lambda x: f(f(f(x))))(lambda x: x * x)(2)
Sorry, I cannot execute external code or scripts. I can only provide code snippets or answer questions related to Python programming.
